short_summary: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME [...] architectural designs shall be the basis for estimation ONLY.
description: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted on February 28, 2023 by 2:00 PM EST. All bids submitted after 2:00 PM EST will result in the bid being declared non-responsive. This is the second phase (Phase Two) of a two-phase process: the first phase evaluated the qualifications of all interested suppliers; the second phase (Phase Two) involves supplying a financial bid on the project based on the attached notice specifications and drawings. Please visit the SAP Ariba RFx Event for complete details. The various accommodation fit-ups have different in-service completion dates. The Public Works and Government Services Canada, Real Property Branch requires a qualified contractor to provide construction management services for an office accommodation and special purpose space modernization (the ‘Work’) within the leased premises of the Joseph Shepard Building (‘the Building’), 4900 Yonge St, Toronto, Ontario. - 'Process for determining the contract award' is a PDF document attached to this record with workflow-id ‘ template_WorkflowCdON_corrindni lwapCd_rebchyfeves Sony TEXT20196863460'
full_summary:
### Contract Opportunity
#### Title
4900 Yonge Street Construction Management Services - Phase 2 RFP

#### Reference Number
WS3635252867-Doc3693166579

#### Solicitation Number
WS3635252867

#### Tender Closing Date
February 28, 2023, 2:00 PM EST

#### Expected Contract Start Date
No specific date is specified. However, the contract is expected to be completed by December 12, 2022.

#### Expected Contract End Date
December 12, 2022

#### Procurement Category
CNST (Construction and Maintenance Services)

#### Tender Type
Invitation to Qualify (Two-Phase Process)

#### Service Description
The contract requires a qualified contractor to provide construction management services for an office accommodation and special purpose space modernization project within the Joseph Shepard Building, located at 4900 Yonge Street, Toronto, Ontario. The accommodation fit-ups have different in-service completion dates.

#### Mandatory Requirements
To be eligible for the tender process, contractors must be qualified suppliers. Suppliers are expected to provide a financial bid on the project based on the specifications and drawings.

#### Note
Suppliers must submit their bids by February 28, 2023, at 2:00 PM EST. Late bids will be declared non-responsive.

#### Contact Information
To obtain all the details, including specifications, drawings, and contract information, please visit the SAP Ariba RFx Event. For any inquiries, please contact Carter Gooch (il-le-lui / he-him-his) at Carter.Gooch@t gpsc gc-pwsc gc gc-ca.

#### Contracting Entity
The contracting entity is the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC). The contracting entity will manage the contract for the end-user department.

#### Trade Agreements
This contract is subject to the following trade agreements: Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), and other trade agreements. 

#### Regions of Opportunity
The contract is available to all qualified contractors in the region of Ontario (except the National Capital Region) and Canada.

#### Regions of Delivery
The construction project will take place at 4900 Yonge Street, Toronto, Ontario, and surroundings. 

#### Notice URL and Attachments
Please consult the notice URL for more information on submission deadlines and procedures
